title: [AUTH] ChatGPT Plus/Pro OAuth integration
description: Phase 2: OpenAI OAuth endpoints, ChatGptPlus provider variant, ion login chatgpt command

logs.msg:
OAuth infrastructure complete. ChatGptPlus provider integrated with:
- OpenAI OAuth flow (PKCE)
- Token storage in ~/.config/ion/auth.json
- TUI provider picker shows ChatGptPlus
- Model fetching maps to OpenAI models
Needs real-world testing with actual ChatGPT Plus subscription.
